amendment.description: Amendment requires that agencies' regulatory flexibility analyses assess the cumulative impact of any rule stemming from the implementation of a free trade agreement in order to provide protection for small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 112-296 to require the estimated cumulative impact on small businesses of any other rule stemming from the implementation of the Free Trade Agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Critz amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
